alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 07 at 1:23AM MST until December 07 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Northern Sioux County and Southern Sioux County. In Wyoming, Goshen County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
